Class: BaseController

Plumage.controller. BaseController

new BaseController()

Controller base class.

Provides common logic for controllers including showing views (see showView), and loading models (see loadModel)

Source:
  • controller/BaseController.js, line 18

Members

contentSelector

CSS selector for where to render top level views. See showView.

Source:
  • controller/BaseController.js, line 33

currentView

The top level view currently shown by this controller

Source:
  • controller/BaseController.js, line 36

Methods

loadModel(model)

Load the specified model. Default implementation delegates to requestManager.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
model Plumage.model.Model

Model to load.
Source:
  • controller/BaseController.js, line 81

showView(view)

Renders and shows a view in the el specified by contentSelector. This hides and triggers onHide on the current view, cancels outstanding requests, then shows and triggers onShow on the specified view.

For more specific css styling, showView also adds the view's bodyCls)) attribute to the DOM body element.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
view Plumage.view.View

View to show.
Source:
  • controller/BaseController.js, line 48
